title: Pixel 6 solidifies Google’s top 5 slot in North America with nearly 400% growth in Q1
content:
Google has spent the better part of a decade trying to push the Pixel in the smartphone market with the United States as its main target. On the back of the Pixel 6 series, it seems Google has finally solidified that slot, with a new report seeing nearly 400% growth in Q1 2022.

more…

The post Pixel 6 solidifies Google’s top 5 slot in North America with nearly 400% growth in Q1 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The results are in, and the first quarter of 2022 has seen the Google Pixel brand grow by nearly 400% in North America thanks to Pixel 6.
